title: Real-ESRGAN Video Upscaler
description: AI-powered video upscaling from 720p to 1080p using Real-ESRGAN. Frame-by-frame super-resolution with GPU acceleration for high-quality video enhancement.

input.name: Model Selection
input.description: Choose model: RealESRGAN_x4plus (general) or realesr-animevideov3 (anime videos)
